prop.name: albumProductionType
prop.desc: Classification of the album by it's type of content: soundtrack, live album, studio album, etc.

prop.name: albumReleaseType
prop.desc: The kind of release which this album is: single, EP or album.

prop.name: byArtist
prop.desc: The artist that performed this album or recording.

MusicPlaylist.name: track
MusicPlaylist.desc: A music recording (track)—usually a single song. If an ItemList is given, the list should contain items of type MusicRecording.

MusicPlaylist.name: numTracks
MusicPlaylist.desc: The number of tracks in this album or playlist.

MusicPlaylist.name: tracks
MusicPlaylist.desc: A music recording (track)—usually a single song.
